document_data.mainbody:
Laelran Aelorothi was a feyri conjurer of House Aelorothi of Siluvanede and a member of the daemonfey in the late 1360s DR.
As a feyri, Laelran had the unique powers to cast dimension door and suggestion once a day each, and was resistant to fires and electricity.
Laelran had a quasit familiar, Noxit, who helped him in his deception.
Circa 1370 DR, Laelran posed as an aspiring male human wizard called Sorndyrn Scarletsash and joined the Arcane Brotherhood of Luskan in order to keep an eye inside the organization.
